entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Erroneous CS0266 on 'byte = byte & byte' #74375
  • Out parameter on Dictionary<TKey, TValue>.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) is flagged by IDE0008 when it shouldn't be #74372
  • constant string allow conversions #74369
  • Autocomplete (Intellisense) doesn't work correctly in project that references another project which has source generated files #74368
  • "Unmerged changes" should use merge markers to mark refactoring conflicts across multiple targets #74366

Closed

  • A test gap in `CheckInvocationArgMixing` method #73550
    17.11
  • Properties with mixed readonly accessors should skip escape checks where possible #35606
    Backlog
  • Performance issue in NET 6 for classes with many properties #66969
  • Consider adjusting wording for `ErrorCode.ERR_NoConvToIDisp` #73559
    17.12
  • Errors for scoped differences in override indexers are missing in some cases #73384
    17.12
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown from FindSymbols.FindReferencesSearchEngine.ProcessDocumentAsync #70850
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35111.61 #74365

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert ImplementTypeOptions to editorconfig options #74376
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Defender Investigation #74374
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74371
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test Lock with .NET 9 runtime #74367
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Switch to STJ for client side LSP serialization #74364
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not use memory mapped files on non-windows #74339
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74373
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove fallbacks and providers (4) #74336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Merge Internal/release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.8 #74335
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use more precise wording for errors specifying requirements for types that can be used in a `using` statement. #74311
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Always check get method parameters in override indexer #74337
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify passing around of FAR symbol groups #74358
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors refkind differences #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow services to use System.Text.Json for OOP comms in Razor #74280
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid reporting redundant and possibly misleading WRN_InlineArrayNotSupportedByLanguage #74283
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Handle span conversions in expression trees #74349
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Convert HideAdvancedMembers option to editorconfig option #74360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • SpillSequenceSpiller – preserve `ref` BoundConditionalOperator in presence of spilling in its either branch #74310
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Additional tests for `ref struct interfaces` feature #74282
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix debug assert with operation blocks in invalid code #74354
    Area-IDE, untriaged
